actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB; International Trade Commission; Office of U.S. Trade Representative; Treasury Department; State Department; Commerce Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to provide for a temporary suspension of duty on natural graphite.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to suspend the duty on natural graphite until December 31, 1984.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to provide for a temporary suspension of duty on natural graphite.
